2021090.name: Konzerthaus Berlin VR
2021090.description:
Visit virtually the Konzerthaus Berlin in the heart of Berlin and its halls and learn more about the history in the VR Tour.
The Konzerthaus Berlin has stood for more than 200 years on perhaps the most beautiful square in the city: the Gendarmenmarkt. This house has experienced a lot: revolutions, wars, destruction, reconstruction. This virtual tour gives you the opportunity to learn more about the history of the house and the halls.

Experience the Konzerthausorchester Berlin with honorary conductor Iván Fischer and choose different positions in the 360° orchestra.
The Konzerthausorchester Berlin plays around 100 concerts per season at the Konzerthaus Berlin. Honorary conductor Iván Fischer gives in this 360° concert experience the possibility to sit on different seats and listen to the music in a unique way. You can also take a seat in the middle of the orchestra and listen to the composition as never before.

Coming soon: In the interactive sound world of "Umwelten - Environments" you can discover different plants and creatures, interact with them and thus change the sounds.
2021090.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
